buildCommand: npx turbo run build --filter=@brepflow/studio --force && find . -name 'dist' -type d && ls -la apps/studio/ && if [ -d apps/studio/dist ]; then cp -r apps/studio/dist ./dist; else echo 'Studio dist not found, checking for build in apps/studio/build'; if [ -d apps/studio/build ]; then cp -r apps/studio/build ./dist; else echo 'No build output found'; fi; fi
